mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, IDCARD, NAME, JQBH, AJBH, PERSONTYPE, SFCNUMBER, CASENAME, CASEINFOID, SYSUSERID, BARXM, BARSYSUSERID, BARIDCARD, BADWDWDM, BADWDWMC,CASETYPE
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_FUN_CASE_PEOPLECASE_ID.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_CASE_PEOPLECASE
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, IDCARD, NAME, JQBH, AJBH, PERSONTYPE, SFCNUMBER, CASENAME, CASEINFOID, SYSUSERID,CASETYPE,
BARXM,
BARSYSUSERID,
BARIDCARD,
BADWDWDM,
BADWDWMC,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0,0,sysdate,sysdate, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{persontype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{casename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{casetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{barxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{barsysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{baridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{badwdwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update FUN_CASE_PEOPLECASE
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSONTYPE = #{persontype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SFCNUMBER = #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASENAME = #{casename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASEINFOID = #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYSUSERID = #{sysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BARXM = #{barxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARSYSUSERID = #{barsysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BARIDCARD = #{baridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BADWDWDM = #{badwdwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BADWDWMC = #{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select * from ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RUM FROM ( select pcase.ID, pcase.SCBJ, pcase.STATE, pcase.CREATETIME, pcase.UPDATETIME, pcase.IDCARD, pcase.NAME, pcase.JQBH, pcase.AJBH, pcase.PERSONTYPE, pcase.SFCNUMBER, pcase.CASENAME, pcase.CASEINFOID, pcase.SYSUSERID, pcase.BARXM, pcase.BARSYSUSERID, pcase.BARIDCARD, pcase.BADWDWDM, pcase.BADWDWMC,pcase.CASETYPE, (select count(0) from fun_archive_sfc aseq where pcase.jqbh=aseq.jqbh and scbj=0 ) submitcount from FUN_CASE_PEOPLECASE pcase LEFT JOIN FUN_CASE_INFO fci ON fci.id=pcase.CASEINFOID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE scbj=0 ) sfc ON fci.id=sfc.CASEINFOID
where 1=1 and pcase.SCBJ=0 and fci.SCBJ=0
AND pcase.JQBH LIKE '%'||#{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND pcase.AJBH LIKE #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND pcase.CASENAME LIKE '%'||#{casename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND pcase.BARXM LIKE '%'||#{barxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ((pcase.BADWDWMC LIKE #{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') or (pcase.BADWDWDM LIKE '%'||#{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') )
AND pcase.PERSONTYPE = #{persontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND fci.LARQ > to_date(#{fciTimebegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND fci.LARQ < to_date(#{fciTimeend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND sfc.UPDATETIME > to_date(#{sfcTimebegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND sfc.UPDATETIME < to_date(#{sfcTimeend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND pcase.CASETYPE = #{casetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND pcase.SYSUSERID = #{sysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
order by pcase.id desc ) A ) WHERE rum > #{pageStart,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND rum <= #{pageEnd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select count(0) from FUN_CASE_PEOPLECASE pcase LEFT JOIN FUN_CASE_INFO fci ON fci.id=pcase.CASEINFOID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE scbj=0 ) sfc ON fci.id=sfc.CASEINFOID
where 1=1 and pcase.SCBJ=0 and fci.SCBJ=0
AND pcase.JQBH LIKE '%'||#{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND pcase.AJBH LIKE #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND pcase.CASENAME LIKE '%'||#{casename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ((pcase.BADWDWMC LIKE '%'||#{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') or (pcase.BADWDWDM LIKE '%'||#{badwdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') )
AND pcase.PERSONTYPE = #{persontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND pcase.BARXM LIKE '%'||#{barxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND fci.LARQ > to_date(#{createTimebegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND fci.LARQ < to_date(#{createTimeend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND sfc.UPDATETIME > to_date(#{sfcTimebegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND sfc.UPDATETIME < to_date(#{sfcTimeend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND pcase.CASETYPE = #{casetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND pcase.SYSUSERID = #{sysuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
